reactNative.description: This lesson you will learn which topics you need to know if you called yourself as react native developer.
This lesson you will learn setup the project
Common Array Methods in JavaScript/TypeScript
Closures
Hoisting
Closures, Hoisting Questions
Async Patterns
React Native Interview Questions: Async Patterns (JavaScript, ESNext, TypeScript)
JavaScript Syntax Sugar in React Native: Destructuring, Rest, Spread, and Template Literals
JavaScript Syntax Sugar in React Native: Destructuring, Rest, Spread, and Template Literals Questions
Modules & tooling ESM imports exports bundlers Metro Webpack
Questions: Modules & tooling ESM imports exports bundlers Metro Webpack
Event loop & concurrency micro vs macro-tasks blocking the JS UI thread
React Native Interview Questions: Event Loop, Concurrency, Microtasks vs Macrotasks, and JS Thread Blocking
Prototypal inheritance & classes prototype chain ES6 class vs manual prototypes
Optional chaining & nullish coalescing ?. and ??
Dynamic imports & code splitting import() lazy-loading modules
Timers & scheduling setTimeout setInterval requestAnimationFrame cleanup to avoid leaks
Error handling patterns: centralized error boundaries, global handlers (ErrorUtils)
TypeScript basics: interfaces vs types, generics, type narrowing, module augmentation
React Native TypeScript Interview Questions: Interfaces vs Types, Generics, Type Narrowing, Module Augmentation
JSX & reconciliation: Virtual DOM diffing, keys
Components functional vs class Fragments
Data flow props state unidirectional updates
Hooks useState useEffect useCallback useMemo custom hooks
React Native TypeScript Hooks Interview Questions: Hooks useState useEffect useCallback useMemo custom hooks
Context API createContext Providers useContext
Interview Questions: Context API createContext Providers useContext
Refs useRef ref forwarding
Error boundaries componentDidCatch getDerivedStateFromError
Render patterns render props higher-order components composition
Question: Render patterns render props higher-order components composition
Suspense & lazy loading Reactlazy Suspense
Event handling Reacts synthetic events cross-platform quirks
Performance: React.memo, useTransition (Concurrent React intro)
DevTools & Profiler: hook inspection, flamegraphs
Type checking: PropTypes or TypeScript interfaces/types
React Native Styling Essentials with Flexbox (TypeScript)
Built-in UI components
Styling Flexbox and Layout
Understanding Device Metrics in React Native: Dimensions, PixelRatio, and useWindowDimensions
React Native Platform Quirks: iOS vs Android Styling, KeyboardAvoidingView, and Permissions
Touch & Gestures in React Native: Pressable, TouchableOpacity, PanResponder, and Gesture Handler
Animations in React Native: Animated API, LayoutAnimation, and Reanimated Basics
Navigation Hooks in React Native: useNavigation and useRoute
StatusBar and Appearance in React Native: Managing StatusBar and Dark Mode
App Lifecycle & State in React Native: Managing AppState and Connectivity (NetInfo)
Storage & Persistence in React Native: AsyncStorage, MMKV, and SecureStore
Linking & Deep Linking in React Native: Using Linking API and Universal/App Links
Accessibility in React Native: accessible Props, accessibilityLabel, Roles, and Focus Management
Native Modules Basics in React Native: Platform, PermissionsAndroid, and Bridging APIs
React Navigation (v5+): Stack, Tabs, Drawers, and Deep Linking
Wix React Native Navigation: A Native Stack Navigation Solution
React Navigation Patterns: Nested Navigators, Param Passing, and Auth Flows
Local State Management in React Native: Context API, useReducer, and Selectors
Global State Management in React Native: Redux, MobX, Recoil, and Lightweight Alternatives
Persistence in React Native: Redux Persist, MMKV, and AsyncStorage Integrations
Async Data Handling in React Native: Redux-Thunk, Redux-Saga, React Query, SWR, and GraphQL Clients
When & Why to Write Native Modules in React Native (Java/Kotlin or Objective-C/Swift)
Bridging in React Native: Exposing Methods, Callbacks, and Event Emitters
Bridging in React Native: Exposing Methods, Callbacks, and Event Emitters
Permissions in React Native: Camera, Location, and Notifications
HTTP & WS: fetch, Axios, WebSockets
Caching & storage: AsyncStorage, MMKV, SQLite
Offline sync patterns
Connectivity & status: @react-native-community/netinfo, reachability checks, offline/online event handling
Background tasks: BackgroundFetch, react-native-background-task, WorkManager (Android)
Retry & queueing: exponential backoff, offline mutation queue (e.g. Redux Offline, Apollo Offline)
Security: HTTPS pinning, certificate handling, secure storage for tokens (Keychain, Keystore)
APIs: Animated, LayoutAnimation, Reanimated
Gesture handling: PanResponder vs React Native Gesture Handler
Types: springs, timing, transitions
Images: bundling @2x/@3x, optimization
Fonts & SVGs: custom fonts, react-native-svg
Video & audio: expo-av or community packages
react-native-maps: markers, clustering
Geolocation: foreground & background updates
Push: FCM / APNs integrations, Notifee / react-native-push-notifications
Questions -> Push: FCM / APNs integrations, Notifee / react-native-push-notifications
Deep & Universal Links: Linking API, custom URL schemes
Avoiding re-renders: React.memo, hook deps
List tweaks: FlatList optimizations, getItemLayout
JS thread: InteractionManager, offload work to native
Flipper, React DevTools, Perf Monitor
Debuggers: Chrome DevTools, Flipper, Reactotron
Logging: console.log, DEV guards
Error/crash reporting: Sentry, Bugsnag
Fast Refresh vs Hot Reload
Unit: Jest + react-test-renderer
Component: React Native Testing Library
E2E: Detox, Appium
iOS: Xcode, provisioning profiles, TestFlight
Android: Gradle, signing configs, Play Store bundles
OTA updates: CodePush, Expo Updates
Expo pros/cons: managed vs bare
Ejecting: when & how
Unimodules
Project structure: folder conventions, module boundaries
Reusable components: DRY, atomic design
Error boundaries & fallback UIs
Accessibility (a11y): labels, roles, focus management
Security: secure storage, encrypted data, avoiding eval
CI/CD & DevOps: GitHub Actions / Bitrise for automated builds/tests, Fastlane for signing & release
Questions: CI/CD & DevOps: GitHub Actions / Bitrise for automated builds/tests, Fastlane for signing & release
CI, Continuous Delivery, and Continuous Deployment stages
Analytics & Monitoring: Segment / Amplitude / Firebase Analytics, performance monitoring (New Relic, Datadog)
Internationalization (i18n): react-native-i18n, FormatJS / Intl usage
Feature Flags & Remote Config: LaunchDarkly, Firebase Remote Config
Monorepos & Code Sharing: Yarn Workspaces, Lerna, NX (for sharing web & native code)
Classic Bridge (Pre-0.60): JavaScriptCore + Bridge, synchronous serialization, manual native modules
Fabric Renderer: concurrent UI, async layout, fine-grained updates
TurboModules: codegen'd native modules, direct JS ↔ Native calls
JSI & Hermes: JavaScript Interface for direct native access, optimized bytecode execution
Codegen: automated type-safe bindings for props, events, modules
Community Engines & Runtimes: Hermes (default), JSC (legacy), V8 Mobile (optional)

javascript.description: Set: add(value), delete(value), has(value), clear(), size. Map: set(key, value), get(key), has(key), delete(key), clear(), size. Both Set and Map support forEach for iteration. Set is used for unique values, Map is used for key-value pairs where keys can be any type.
javascript.name: topic
